Author: randallsquared
Content: I think their secret is that YC deliberately tries to choose founders with a certain design sensibility.

Author: pg
Content: They're all designed by different people.  Though in a sense they all use me, since I nag them to fix the more egregious design mistakes.

Author: pg
Content: I don't think it made that much difference.  There are probably 100 people who are such hardcore Lisp fans that they'd become users of any web app written in it, but not 1000.

Author: pg
Content: Henceforward any further spam submissions about quintura will be killed.

Author: aston
Content:
I didn't find out about Reddit being written in LISP until it wasn't anymore.

My vote's that it was popular because it was good.

Author: rms
Content: Why not treat your body right AND improve yourself with prescription drugs? Surely both will have more effect than one alone.
